channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report E-2025030036
item.description:
Report E-2025030036

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-11
  • City: ELKO
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 77000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Van trailer caught fire due to brake malfunction. Fire department and first responders contained the fire and Clean Harbors internal emergency response teams responded to remediate the scene. Impacted areas were asphalt, gravel and soil. No water or storm drains were impacted. Remediation of environment completed to NDOT satisfaction. Trailer and all hazmat being transported was a total loss. We cannot provide further packaging specifications.
